sprint_goal: Establish core tenant registration and user login flow with security and accessibility foundations.
epic_coverage: Tenant & User Lifecycle Management, Platform Foundation & DevOps
key_deliverables: Public registration page; Admin user creation; Secure login; WCAG 2.1 AA baseline implementation.
demo_objectives: Successfully register a new organization; Log in as the new Admin; Demonstrate screen reader compatibility on the login page.
success_criteria: New users can register and log in; All UI meets baseline accessibility standards.
risk_factors: RISK-009: Architectural complexity of data residency; RISK-008: Accessibility refactoring is extensive.
mitigation_strategies: Defer multi-region implementation to a later sprint; Prioritize accessibility audit and setup early.
burndown_target: Linear burndown, aiming for 17 story points completed by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement the complete user invitation, activation, deactivation, and password recovery workflows, and establish core team structures.
epic_coverage: Tenant & User Lifecycle Management, Administration & Reporting Dashboard
key_deliverables: Admin user invitation flow; User registration completion; User deactivation; 'Forgot Password' flow; Admin team creation.
demo_objectives: Admin invites a new user; Invited user receives an email and registers; Admin deactivates a user; Deactivated user fails to log in; Admin creates a new team.
success_criteria: Full user lifecycle is functional and secure; Basic organizational structure can be created.
risk_factors: Complexity of secure token management for invitations; RISK-001: Security rules for team creation.
mitigation_strategies: Use short-lived, single-use tokens; Implement comprehensive security rule test suite.
integration_windows: E2E testing of invitation flow on day 7-8.

sprint_goal: Deliver the core mobile attendance marking functionality, including check-in/out with GPS, robust permission handling, and offline capabilities.
epic_coverage: Core Attendance & Approval Workflow, Tenant & User Lifecycle Management
key_deliverables: Mobile app check-in/out with GPS; Location permission handling; Offline attendance marking; GDPR consent flow.
demo_objectives: Subordinate logs in, is prompted for location permission; Subordinate successfully checks in online; Subordinate checks out while in airplane mode.
success_criteria: A Subordinate user can complete a full, verifiable attendance cycle on the mobile app, both online and offline.
risk_factors: RISK-003: Reliability of custom offline tracking; Inconsistent GPS performance across devices.
mitigation_strategies: Implement auxiliary tracking for offline records; Test on a wide range of physical devices.
integration_windows: Physical device testing throughout the sprint.

sprint_goal: Implement the foundational reporting dashboard, including offline sync reliability and core filtering capabilities.
epic_coverage: Core Attendance & Approval Workflow, Administration & Reporting Dashboard
key_deliverables: Automatic sync for offline records; Sync failure notifications; Admin summary reports (Daily/Weekly); Report filtering.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate an offline record syncing automatically; Show sync failure banner; Admin views daily summary report; Admin filters report by date range.
success_criteria: Offline data is reliably synced; Admins have a functional, high-level view of attendance data.
risk_factors: RISK-004: Performance of reporting queries at scale.
mitigation_strategies: Commit to server-side aggregation strategy early in the sprint.
integration_windows: Integration of aggregation functions with reporting UI on day 8.
